Strike enemies in front, bouncing them into the air, then strike again for another bounce.\n#yPhysical Damage: {0}% + {1}

Increases your stats. You'll continuously gain #vpower#w while the skill is active until you reach the max amount, then you'll become #ylethargic#w.
#yGrants {1} #vpower#y every {0} sec while the skill is active. (Power cannot be restored).
Movement Speed and Action Speed: +{2}%
Final Damage: +{3}%

#wPower
#yUp to {4}
Restores {6} power every {5} sec naturally.

#wLethargy
#yMovement Speed: -{7}%
HP: -{9}% per {8} sec
Press the #yspecial attack button#w when you're being hit to push nearby enemies back.\n#yPhysical Damage: {0}% + {1}
Stab forward, attacking enemies, then tug your weapon back to draw them towards you.\n#yPhysical Damage: {0}% + {1}

Fire a spear of light that explodes when it hits an enemy, dealing damage to all nearby enemies and knocking down the enemy hit. Press the #yregular attack button#w during the attack to manually activate the explosion.\n#yMagic Damage: {0}% + {1}\nAdditional Damage to Center: {2}%
Press the #yregular attack button#w during Tumble to charge forward and strike enemies twice with your weapon.\n#yPhysical Damage: {0}% + {1}

Creates a red magic circle that buffs the damage of all allies within it. 
#yGrants {0} #vPower#y when used.
Magic Circle Range: {1}m
Magic Circle Duration: {2} sec#w

Buff Effect
#yPhysical Damage: +{3}%
Magic Damage: +{4}%
Buff Duration: {5} sec
Jump, then throw a magical spear to the ground, which will deal damage and then explode after #y{0} sec#w.\n#yMagic Damage: {1}% + {2}\n#yExplosion Damage: {3}% + {4}
Jump and charge forward in a twirl as you slash enemies, ending with a strong downward chop that launches nearby enemies.\n#yPhysical Damage: {0}% + {1}\nInvincibility: {2} sec

Creates a blue magic circle that buffs all allies within it, reducing the damage they take.
#yGrants {0} #vPower#y when used.
Magic Circle Range: {1}m
Magic Circle Duration: {2} sec#w

Buff Effect
#yAll Damage Taken: -{3}%
Buff Duration: {4} sec
Somersault forward twice, dealing damage to enemies. Press the #yup arrow twice#w or #yShift + up arrow#w in the air to use the skill.\n#yLight Magic\nMagic Damage: {0}% + {1}

Perform a twirl-thrust as you move forward, drawing enemies toward you. You'll adopt a ready stance at the end. You can deal additional hits in this stance. If you hold the stance for at least {0} sec, you'll reduce the skill's cooldown by {1} sec.

Additional Hits During Stance
#y(Regular Attack Button): #wPerform one more twirl-thrust and then adopt the ready stance again. Can be performed up to two times. The skill's cooldown will decrease by 2 more seconds during the last twirl-thrust.
#yPhysical Damage: {2}% + {3}
(Special Attack Button): #wGather energy, then slash enemies in front to blow them away. Damage will increase based on the number of twirl-thrusts you've performed.
#yPhysical Damage: {4}% + {5}
Damage per Twirl-thrust: +{6}%

Perch at the top of your weapon to evade enemy attacks. Press the #yregular attack button#w to jump down, strike the ground, and launch enemies. Press the #yspecial attack button#w instead to jump forward and dodge enemy attacks.
You can also activate this skill by pressing the #yJump button#w during Tumble.
#yGrants {0} #vPower#y when used.
Physical Damage: {1}% + {2}
Invincibility: {3} sec

Leap into the sky with the help of your spear, then slam back down, temporarily exposing the weak spots of your enemies. 
#yPhysical Damage: {0}% + {1}

#wWeak Spot
#yPhysical Defense: -{2}%
Duration: {3} sec

Twirl your spear quickly to continuously damage enemies and gather magical energy, which then explodes in a massive frontal attack. The lingering magic creates a buff that increases your Light Attack.
#yLight Magic
Magic Damage: {0}% + {1}

#wBuff
#yLight Attack: +{2}%
Only applies to caster when in range.
Duration: {3} sec
